==Story==
{{VO/Story
|character           = Jean

|vo_01_01_title      = Hello
|vo_01_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hello.ogg
|vo_01_01_tx         = I am Jean, the Dandelion Knight, requesting approval to join your party. From this day onwards, my honor and loyalty lie with you.

|vo_02_01_title      = Chat: Operation
|vo_02_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Operation.ogg
|vo_02_01_tx         = It's time to move on, we shouldn't stay here.
|vo_02_02_title      = Chat: Knights of Favonius
|vo_02_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Knights of Favonius.ogg
|vo_02_02_tx         = I do hope the [[Knights of Favonius]] are all working hard...
|vo_02_03_title      = Chat: Target
|vo_02_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Target.ogg
|vo_02_03_tx         = Onwards! We have work to do.

<!-- Weather -->
|vo_03_01_title      = When It Rains
|vo_03_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Rains.ogg
|vo_03_01_tx         = The rain won't slow me down.
|vo_03_02_title      = After the Rain
|vo_03_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} After the Rain.ogg
|vo_03_02_tx         = This weather is perfect, we should move out.
|vo_03_03_title      = When It Snows
|vo_03_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Snows.ogg
|vo_03_03_tx         = Snow. Remember &mdash; tend to your boots when we return.
|vo_03_04_title      = When It's Windy
|vo_03_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It's Windy.ogg
|vo_03_04_tx         = Such fine weather.
|vo_03_05_title      = When the Wind Is Blowing
|vo_03_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} When the Wind Is Blowing.ogg
|vo_03_05_tx         = Legend has it the wind was unusually strong on that day too...

|vo_04_01_title      = Good Morning
|vo_04_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Morning.ogg
|vo_04_01_tx         = A successful day starts from the morning. Let's give it our all today.
|vo_04_02_title      = Good Afternoon
|vo_04_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Afternoon.ogg
|vo_04_02_tx         = We've still got work to do. Let's keep going.
|vo_04_03_title      = Good Evening
|vo_04_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Evening.ogg
|vo_04_03_tx         = It seems I'm immune to coffee now. Perhaps I need to ask [[Lisa]] for something... a little stronger...
|vo_04_04_title      = Good Night
|vo_04_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Night.ogg
|vo_04_04_tx         = Training is finished for today. Great work, you've earned a good rest.

|vo_05_01_title      = About {name}
|vo_05_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character}.ogg
|vo_05_01_tx         = Today I had no choice but to cut down five [[Ruin Guard]]s to protect the people of our city... Ugh, I must continue to work harder. Though hostile, destroying such precious artifacts is still a loss to us all. I must find a less destructive way to bring them down next time...

|vo_06_01_title      = About Us: Creed
|vo_06_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Creed.ogg
|vo_06_01_tx         = You have my complete and full support. Of course, if your path ever deviates from justice, I will not hesitate to point it out.
|vo_06_02_title      = About Us: Oath
|vo_06_02_friendship = 6
|vo_06_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Oath.ogg
|vo_06_02_tx         = I swear by this sword, victory shall be yours.
|vo_06_03_title      = About Us: Quest
|vo_06_03_friendship = 6
|vo_06_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Quest.ogg
|vo_06_03_tx         = Our work will not handle itself... But, I suppose the occasional short break is warranted. Let us rest for a couple of minutes.

|vo_07_01_title      = About the [[Vision]]
|vo_07_01_friendship = 4
|vo_07_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision.ogg
|vo_07_01_tx         = "For [[Mondstadt]], as always" is the [[Gunnhildr Clan|Gunnhildr family]] motto. Every time I use my Vision, I am reminded of my [[Frederica Gunnhildr|mother]] and the hopes of the people of Mondstadt. For Mondstadt, for freedom &mdash; that is what I fight for.
|vo_07_01_mention    = Frederica Gunnhildr

|vo_07_02_title      = Something to Share
|vo_07_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share.ogg
|vo_07_02_tx         = On behalf of the Knights of Favonius, I would like to extend my gratitude to you for all you have done for Mondstadt. Please remember to rest from time to ti... Did I miss something? What are you laughing at? Did I say something odd?

|vo_07_03_title      = Interesting Things
|vo_07_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Things.ogg
|vo_07_03_tx         = "Dandelion, Dandelion, ride the wind to a faraway land." Who knows, the wind might take it all the way to [[Celestia]].

|vo_08_01_title      = About [[Barbara]]
|vo_08_01_friendship = 4
|vo_08_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Barbara.ogg
|vo_08_01_tx         = Barbara is a hard worker, but I feel she's too hard on herself sometimes... What? You ask me how I know all this? It's because the order also manages the [[Church of Favonius|Church]].
|vo_08_01_mention    = Barbara

|vo_08_02_title      = About [[Lisa]]
|vo_08_02_friendship = 4
|vo_08_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Lisa.ogg
|vo_08_02_tx         = When Lisa is around, I always have peace of mind.
|vo_08_02_mention    = Lisa

|vo_08_03_title      = About [[Amber]]
|vo_08_03_friendship = 4
|vo_08_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Amber.ogg
|vo_08_03_tx         = I must say that Amber's development has impressed me recently. I hope that one day, her deeds will become the words of a bard's tale.
|vo_08_03_mention    = Amber

|vo_08_04_title      = About [[Kaeya]]
|vo_08_04_friendship = 4
|vo_08_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Kaeya.ogg
|vo_08_04_tx         = Is that right...? Kaeya also gave you some suggestions. He is an excellent knight after all &mdash; this is a fact no one can deny.
|vo_08_04_mention    = Kaeya

|vo_08_05_title      = About [[Klee]]
|vo_08_05_friendship = 4
|vo_08_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Klee.ogg
|vo_08_05_tx         = Though it may be said that it is in a child's nature to play, the things Klee plays with are far from toys. I can never take my eyes off her.
|vo_08_05_mention    = Klee

|vo_08_06_title      = About [[Albedo]]
|vo_08_06_friendship = 4
|vo_08_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Albedo.ogg
|vo_08_06_tx         = Sometimes I feel that terms like "genius" were originally created for Albedo.
|vo_08_06_mention    = Albedo

|vo_08_07_title      = About [[Varka]]
|vo_08_07_friendship = 4
|vo_08_07_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Varka.ogg
|vo_08_07_tx         = Grand Master Varka is the legend of his generation. On the day of his triumphant return, I shall be sure to personally introduce you to him. I'm sure you too will be in awe of his greatness.
|vo_08_07_mention    = Varka

|vo_08_08_title      = About [[Noelle]]
|vo_08_08_friendship = 4
|vo_08_08_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Noelle.ogg
|vo_08_08_tx         = Noelle... She puts enormous effort into trying to become a Knight of Favonius. However, I fear she is not quite ready for the dangers that lie beyond Mondstadt's walls.
|vo_08_08_mention    = Noelle

|vo_08_09_title      = About [[Rosaria]]
|vo_08_09_friendship = 4
|vo_08_09_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Rosaria.ogg
|vo_08_09_tx         = Some may see Sister Rosaria as one who complains about how bothersome her work is, but she does her job well. Last time I saw her I told her she could come find me should she ever need help, to which she simply replied that doing so would be even more bothersome. I need to work harder to become of more assistance to the people of Mondstadt.
|vo_08_09_mention    = Rosaria

|vo_08_10_title      = About [[Diluc]]: Disillusion
|vo_08_10_friendship = 4
|vo_08_10_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Diluc - Disillusion.ogg
|vo_08_10_tx         = Master Diluc has his reasons for being so critical of the Knights of Favonius. I am not proud of the way things went, but I cannot change the past. All I can do is keep working hard, in the hope he may one day see us in a better light... This is my duty.
|vo_08_10_mention    = Diluc

|vo_08_11_title      = About [[Diluc]]: Respect
|vo_08_11_friendship = 4
|vo_08_11_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Diluc - Respect.ogg
|vo_08_11_tx         = Master Diluc is my senior, and I have the utmost respect for him. Though we have gone separate ways, I can sense we share the same strong commitment to protecting Mondstadt at all costs.
|vo_08_11_mention    = Diluc

|vo_08_12_title      = About [[Sucrose]]
|vo_08_12_friendship = 4
|vo_08_12_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Sucrose.ogg
|vo_08_12_tx         = Sucrose is also a rare talent in the field of alchemy. Under Albedo's mentorship, she is sure to flourish. I am sure her future will be bright. The only thing is... Ahem, I was momentarily lost in thought. It is nothing. Nothing bad, anyway.
|vo_08_12_mention    = Albedo,Sucrose

|vo_08_13_title      = About [[Eula]]
|vo_08_13_friendship = 4
|vo_08_13_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Eula.ogg
|vo_08_13_tx         = Eula? Um... Please, do not hold her unfortunate background against her. The Knights of Favonius evaluate each person impartially. Eula has a clear sense of right and wrong and is more talented than most. The controversial statements that she makes from time to time are just a product of her personality. For instance, she always mentions wanting to challenge me, but I don't mind.
|vo_08_13_mention    = Eula

|vo_08_14_title      = About [[Mika]]
|vo_08_14_friendship = 4
|vo_08_14_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Mika.ogg
|vo_08_14_tx         = The Grand Master placed Mika on the front line of the expedition team not simply because he met the requirements of the mission &mdash; more importantly, he was impressed by Mika's hardworking and grounded nature. From my own perspective, I feel very honored to work with someone like him.
|vo_08_14_mention    = Varka,Mika

|vo_09_01_title      = More About {name}: I
|vo_09_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01.ogg
|vo_09_01_tx         = I shoulder the knights' trust and the people's hope. It is for this reason, I must stay vigilant.
|vo_09_02_title      = More About {name}: II
|vo_09_02_friendship = 3
|vo_09_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_09_02_tx         = [[Vennessa]]'s title &mdash; "Dandelion Knight" &mdash; has been passed down from generation to generation. Countless great knights were awarded with this honor and I will not bring shame to this name. Thus, I must keep going. I must become the sword and aegis of the people.
|vo_09_02_mention    = Vennessa
|vo_09_03_title      = More About {name}: III
|vo_09_03_friendship = 4
|vo_09_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_09_03_tx         = Only glorious victories are recorded in legends and history books. Surely even the great knights of old must have had their struggles?<br>Wind, please show me the path.
|vo_09_04_title      = More About {name}: IV
|vo_09_04_friendship = 5
|vo_09_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx         = When I'm wholeheartedly devoted to my work, all of my troubles and and even my sense of time seem to just slip away. Hmm, Grand Master Varka did say to me: "Jean, there is no better candidate for this task"...
|vo_09_04_mention    = Varka
|vo_09_05_title      = More About {name}: V
|vo_09_05_friendship = 6
|vo_09_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx         = As I walk with you, the path ahead becomes clearer. It's almost as if I have finally found someone I can trust, I wonder if...<br>No, this must mean that I am still lacking in strength... I must not give up, I will not &mdash; I cannot fail the knights and the people of Mondstadt. Still... thank you.

|vo_10_01_title      = {name}'s Hobbies
|vo_10_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hobbies.ogg
|vo_10_01_tx         = Maybe we can discuss the tales of legendary heroes. Have you heard the story of the heroic king of [[Khaenri'ah]]?
|vo_10_02_title      = {name}'s Troubles
|vo_10_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Troubles.ogg
|vo_10_02_tx         = If only there was some kind of mysterious potion that could keep me awake forever... I need to have a talk with Lisa tomorrow.
|vo_10_02_mention    = Lisa
|vo_10_03_title      = Favorite Food
|vo_10_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_03_tx         = It's been ages since I had a pizza at [[Cat's Tail]]. If only they delivered...
|vo_10_04_title      = Least Favorite Food
|vo_10_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Least Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_04_tx         = A true knight can't afford to be a picky eater.

<!-- Receiving a Gift -->
|vo_11_01_title      = Receiving a Gift: I
|vo_11_01_file       = VO Jean Receiving a Gift - 01.ogg
|vo_11_01_tx         = Not only is the taste magnificent, but you've also made sure it was healthy. You have my gratitude.

|vo_11_02_title      = Receiving a Gift: II
|vo_11_02_file       = VO Jean Receiving a Gift - 02.ogg
|vo_11_02_tx         = Hmm yes, I feel a lot more energetic now, thanks to you.

|vo_11_03_title      = Receiving a Gift: III
|vo_11_03_file       = VO Jean Receiving a Gift - 03.ogg
|vo_11_03_tx         = Ahem... all in all, I appreciate the effort.

|vo_12_01_title      = Birthday
|vo_12_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Birthday.ogg
|vo_12_01_tx         = Today is a day worth celebrating. If you must ask why, well, let me remind you that today is when you, the one who is blessed by the wind, came into the world. Since this is your birthday, I'll allow you to take it easy.<br>Ahem... ♪Happy birthday to you...♪<br>Uh... Please forgive my presumptuousness. I hope this gift is to your liking.

|vo_13_01_title      = Feelings About Ascension: Intro
|vo_13_01_ascension  = 1
|vo_13_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 01.ogg
|vo_13_01_tx         = Good. On to our next objective.
|vo_13_02_title      = Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
|vo_13_02_ascension  = 2
|vo_13_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 02.ogg
|vo_13_02_tx         = As the wind continues to blow, so too shall I continue to fight.
|vo_13_03_title      = Feelings About Ascension: Climax
|vo_13_03_ascension  = 4
|vo_13_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 03.ogg
|vo_13_03_tx         = Although we have peace, we must not become complacent. As the Acting Grand Master, I must remain vigilant.
|vo_13_04_title      = Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
|vo_13_04_ascension  = 6
|vo_13_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 04.ogg
|vo_13_04_tx         = I am still not good enough. Ever since I met you, I have been indebted to you for your assistance. My gratitude...<br>Wind, please forgive my selfishness. Not as the Acting Grand Master, but as Jean - I hereby swear that my sword shall always go with you.
}}
